metadata.title: CVE-2022-20452 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In initializeFromParcelLocked of BaseBundle.java, there is a possiblemethod arbitrary code execution due to a confused deputy. This could leadto local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android-13Android ID: A-240138318

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
